entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 15.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 late this morning then west 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy. Local amount 5 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
